articles.title: AI forcing some people to change career industries. Here's how to set a new course
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is starting to impact the labor market and that has many people considering a career change.

articles.title: AI euphoria to fuel 20% rally by end-2026, Evercore ISI says
articles.summary: US stocks can rise another 20% by the end of 2026, driven by the excitement around artificial intelligence, according to strategists at Evercore ISI.

articles.title: AI Helps Brit Rediscover Her Lost Voice After 25 Years
articles.summary: A British woman suffering from motor neurone disease who lost her ability to speak is once again talking in her own voice, thanks to artificial intelligence and a barely audible eight-second clip from an old home video.
articles.translated_title: AI Helps Brit Rediscover Her Lost Voice After 25 Years
articles.translated_summary: A British woman suffering from motor neurone disease who lost her ability to speak is once again talking in her own voice, thanks to artificial intelligence and a barely audible eight-second clip from an old home video.

articles.title: 'Memory of Princess Mumbi' Director Damien Hauser on AI, African Film
articles.summary: Set in a retro-futuristic Africa, the film utilizes AI to craft a clever, bittersweet meta-fiction about art, memory and artificial intelligence.

articles.title: OpenAI Plans India Data Center in Major Stargate Expansion
articles.summary: OpenAI is seeking to build a massive new data center in India that could mark a major step forward in Asia for its Stargate-branded artificial intelligence infrastructure push.
